name: Umbreon
fact: Umbreon evolves from Eevee and is known for its ability to blend into the shadows and its defensive capabilities.

name: Sableye
fact: Sableye is known for its mischievous nature and its ability to cause trouble with its ghostly powers.

name: Sharpedo
fact: Sharpedo is known as the 'Brutal Pokémon' and is infamous for its aggressive nature and sharp teeth.

name: Darkrai
fact: Darkrai is known for its ability to induce nightmares and its mysterious nature as a legendary Pokémon.

name: Yveltal
fact: Yveltal is known as the 'Destruction Pokémon' and has the power to absorb life energy from its surroundings.
